name: Kostiantyn Nazarenko
title: Senior Software Architect / Engineer
summary:
My journey in internet-related projects began in 2000, and since then, I have enjoyed building complex systems and designing the architecture of web-oriented software.

I have vast and diverse experience, tried many different types of projects, web technologies and been involved in a range of different roles. I enjoy the variety and challenges that many IT businesses experience.

When I do my best work is when the challenge and my passion merge. In all the work I do I look for meaning and purpose and when things are not productive I begin looking for creative ways to optimize and remove non-efficient work routines, in collaboration with my colleagues and the team I'm a part of.

For work to be exciting and fun, and for me to be the best engineer I can be: Constant growth and learning is always the best way to keep a) my mind in shape b) my self relevant in an ever-changing workplace. And therefore I strive to improve also in my spare time.

I'm a native speaker of Ukrainian and Russian. I have an advanced level of English (C1/C2) and an intermediate level of Spanish (B1).
